thread.title: 'Before I die': 31 things San Antonians want to do
thread.title_full: 'Before I die': 31 things San Antonians want to do - San Antonio Express-News

author: J.M. Scott, San Antonio Express-News
title: 'Before I die': 31 things San Antonians want to do
text:

Photo: Alexander Spatari, Getty Images Before I die I want to "go to Japan." Image 31 of 32 Before I die I want to "LIVE!"
Photo: Arand, Getty Images Before I die I want to "LIVE!" Image 32 of 32 'Before I die': 31 things San Antonians want to do 1 / 32 Back to Gallery Ever since a chalkboard went up on the Houston Street Garage last July, passersby have been filling it up with bucket-list wishes.
Arstist Candy Chang's interactive exhibit "Before I die I want to___" is connecting big dreams and life goals from people of all walks of life, tourists and locals in downtown S.A.
Travel the world. Kiss boys. Help the homeless. Meet Drake. See more of what San Antonians want to do before they die in the above gallery.
From the grandiose to the absurd to the downright pragmatic, this list is a snapshot of San Antonio in a limited time and space. The board is filled and erased and filled again throughout the week.
RELATED: 27 things San Antonians can't live without
A collaboration between District 1, Center City Development & Operations and the city's Department for Culture and Creative Development, the project is planned to stay up for a few months, according to the Facebook page of the CCD .
And around the globe, there are currently more than 1,000 sites of "Before I Die" in more than 75 countries.
jmscott@mySA.com
